name: Fridge
description: A family of 4 with 2 young children who was homeless. They had recently attained their rental flat. However, due to financial constraints, they are unable to purchase furniture for their new home.

name: Stroller
description: Family have 2 young children and 1 newborn since wife gave birth in January 2024. Husband is working part-time jobs to help with caregiving. The stroller would help the family be more able to prioritize their finances on the needs of the children.

contact.name: Nur Fatin Athirah Binte Mohamad Husaini

name: Stroller
description: Client is currently heavily pregnant and caring for one more young toddler. Husband is the sole breadwinner as client is unable to work due to her pregnancy. Family only have sufficient funds to meet basic needs and is unable to purchase a stroller. The stroller is essential especially after the birth of the newborn as client has to bring the baby for checkups and might sometimes have to bring the toddler as well.

contact.org: Allkin Singapore's Youth Service @ Punggol, Pasir Ris, Tampines
contact.name: Olenka Lim

name: Sofa
description:
Client (F/41) living in a public rental flat with 2 young children. Husband is trying to find work and family is on public assistance. Family looking for a sofa 

Donor to kindly cover transport arrangement and delivery cost please. Thank you!!

contact.org: Allkin Family Service Centre @ Ang Mo Kio 230
contact.name: Tasya Puspita Maulany

name: Table
description: The household has 5 persons living in a 1 room rental flat.  The mother is unable to work due to health conditions.  She is seeking a rectangular table for use in the kitchen.

name: Wardrobe
description: Rental flat household consists of a sole breadwinner and a bedbound member. Their home just underwent decluttering and bedbug fumigation, and they disposed their bedbug-infested furniture. Hence require a wardrobe for their clothes.

name: Wardrobe
description: Low-income family requires 2 wardrobes as their current one is faulty. The main breadwinner is working part-time due to multiple health issues.

contact.name: Joyce Ng

name: Wardrobe
description: Family is sourcing for items to furnish their flat, having recently taken over the public rental unit following the death of father. Children are in mainstream and tertiary schools and family is low-income. Would appreciate if donor can cover transport costs too. Please WhatsApp Ignatius at 8718 8452 or email to Ignatius.Pereira@thkmc.org.sg to liaise.

name: Wardrobe
description: Single mother family of two children (F/7 with special needs and F/17) looking for a wardrobe urgently as their current one is no longer in suitable condition. Family currently living in a 2-room rental flat at Teck Whye area.

name: Wardrobe
description: Wardrobe required for single mother who is giving birth in March 2024 and moving into a new rental flat with young daughter. Mum is not working due to pregnancy status and hopes to furnish flat before EDD in end-March 2024.

contact.org: Montfort Care - Kreta Ayer Family Services
contact.name: Jessica Ho

name: Queen Size Bedframe
description:
Client is a single mother. She and her 3 young children just moved into a HDB public rental unit. She is currently unemployed as the sole caregiver for her children and requires a queen size bed frame (preferably with legs). If you have a suitable item for donation please drop me a message at 9296 0569 or drop me an email at muhammadsuffian@mws.sg.
Thank you!

name: Wardrobe
description: Client is staying in a 2-rm rental flat with her school-going son. She is currently receiving SSO ComCare assistance as she is unable to work due to her multiple health issues. She is seeking assistance for a wardrobe for her place. For further liaison, kindly contact Harsheni at 8138 3741, thank you in advance!

name: Bedframe queen size
description: Family comprises of single mother taking care of 3 school going children. They are currently sleeping on a queen sized mattress with a sinked in Bed frame that may break at any time.

name: Wardrobe
description: Single parent with three children requires a wardrobe as her current one is spoilt. It will be used to store the family's clothes and various items. Family has financial difficulties and are unable to buy a replacement.
